snippet.description: Organizations seeks short- and long-term help in Calvert, Charles and St. Mary's counties

snippet.title: 21 fresh bars for every occasion
snippet.description: A toast to Washington's fresh batch of bars: Places to sip, snack and celebrate right now.

snippet.title: Span's sacrifice fly in 9th lifts Nats over Cards
snippet.description: Denard Span's approach with the bases loaded in the bottom of the ninth inning proves math pays off.

snippet.title: Nationals vs. Cardinals: Denard Span's sacrifice fly lifts Washington to 3-2 win over St. Louis
snippet.description: Denard Span hits a walk-off sacrifice fly and Washington forces a series split with St. Louis.

snippet.title: Bryce Harper needed a reality check, and Matt Williams gave it to him with benching
snippet.description: When Matt Williams benched Bryce Harper for not hustling on Saturday, the Nationals' manager did the right thing.

snippet.title: Boston race makes room for those affected by bombs
Canadiens grab 3-0 series lead with 3-2 win
snippet.description: The Montreal Canadiens looked as if they would cruise to an easy win when Rene Bourque scored only 11 seconds into the game.

snippet.title: Kuchar rallies from 4 back to win RBC Heritage
snippet.description: Matt Kuchar saw his well-struck 5-iron on the 18th hole at the RBC Heritage come up way short of the target and settle in a front bunker.

snippet.title: Cuba home woes endure despite real-estate reform
snippet.description: The residents of 308 Oquendo Street were jolted awake in the middle of the night by violent shaking and a noise that they likened to a freight train, or an exploding bomb.

snippet.title: National roundup: Thousands in Colorado celebrate traditional pot holiday
snippet.description: A roundup of news from across the nation.
